group_1.textLeft: With the collapse of the Wings of Magius,@Witches have been weakening.

group_1.textRight: Nobody is raising them anymore, and there's@no environment for them to grow.
There will be fewer Witches from now on, so@maybe we should keep track of their numbers.

group_1.textLeft: I agree...
I don't want us to go back to fighting over@territory.

group_1.textRight: We'll see how things develop, but there's@no need to worry that much.
The Kamihama Magia Union also serves as@a mutual aid organization.

group_1.textLeft: All right, let's just keep an eye on things for@now and discuss it in the future.

group_1.textRight: That's it for our discussion, but is there@anything else?
| Is it over? Did you need me for something? |

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, there's something I wanted to talk@about at the end with everyone, including you.

group_1.textRight: | What is it? |

group_1.textLeft: We've been approaching everyone, and the@Union has a lot of people now, right?
So I think we should have a social gathering.

group_1.textRight: That's quite abrupt.

group_1.textLeft: I'm worried about the lack of opportunities@for everyone to meet each other.
Some of us haven't seen each other since@the explanation about the Wings of Magius.
I think it would be better if we made an@opportunity for that...

group_1.textRight: I think it's a good idea.

group_1.textLeft: You're right. Even though people say that time@apart makes the heart grow fonder...
I think it's more realistic to assume that the@distance would actually increase.

group_1.textRight: In that case, I support the idea. A great number@of members require greater care.

group_1.textLeft: So, I'd like to have a cherry blossom viewing with@everyone at the [textBlue:Rumor] of the Eternal Sakura.
Sakurako, what do you think...?

group_1.textRight: | As long as you and the others have fun and@don't litter. |
| You're welcome to use it. |

group_1.textLeft: Cherry blossom viewing... It's not the season,@but...

group_1.textRight: I can't wait to see what kind of food you're@gonna serve!

group_1.textLeft: You have to help prepare it too, you know?

group_1.textRight: Wha...?! But, my specialty is only eating things...
Mmngh...

group_1.textLeft: Are you not happy about it, Touka?

group_1.textRight: I don't mind a social gathering, but I don't think@we should host it at the Eternal Sakura...

group_1.textLeft: Why?

group_1.textRight: I want to keep it as a secret shelter for us.
Nemu and I have our transformation restricted,@so we need a safe zone.

group_1.textLeft: It's true that remnant Feathers could appear.
If you have a secret shelter, it's natural that@you want to protect it.

group_1.textRight: | That's a shame... |

group_1.textLeft: But I do wanna have a get-together...
[chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh!
In that case, let's hold it at the cherry blossom@viewing spot in Sankyo!
There's a cherry blossom viewing spot in@Sankyo...?
Oh, I know the one you're talking about. I used@to go there with my grandmother a long time ago.

group_1.textRight: Yup, yup! It's one of the most famous@attractions in Sankyo!
Even if there are no cherry blossoms, it'll@still feel like a picnic!

group_1.textLeft: If everyone can get together, that might be@a good choice.
Let's go see cherry blossoms another time.
Why not ask Sakurako to make it bloom?

group_1.textRight: | What? |

group_1.textLeft: Can you do that, Sakurako?

group_1.textRight: | I don't know, and I don't want to. |

group_1.textLeft: Huh...uh, are you in a bad mood...?

group_1.textRight: | That's because everyone prefers Sankyo's@cherry blossoms over mine, don't they...? |

group_1.textLeft: No way, it's because we were told not to use@your place.
We're not trying to be dismissive of it.

group_1.textRight: | But I don't like how that takes priority over@mine... |

group_1.textLeft: If you don't want to do it, Sakurako, I won't@ask you to.

group_1.textRight: I got it! I know what to do!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: Sakurako should see for herself if the sakura@tree in Sankyo is suitable for a viewing party.
Then she can make the decision herself.

group_1.textLeft: That's quite interesting.
While you're at it, why don't you see if you@can make that tree's cherry blossoms bloom?
We can't rule out the possibility that you@have an unknown ability to make flowers bloom.
It's also an opportunity to broaden your@horizons.

group_1.textRight: That's right, you've become more talkative@since you've started going to school.
It's another chance to grow!

group_1.textLeft: How about it, Iroha?
There's no rush, so I don't mind at all.
But what about you, Sakurako?

group_1.textRight: | If Touka and Nemu say so, then I'll go judge@for myself if that sakura tree is worthy. |
She's gettin' all fired up...

group_1.textLeft: Is it her pride as a sakura tree?

group_1.textCenter: Let's do our best today!@[chara:800100:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:800100:cheek_0][chara:800100:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:800100:lipSynch_1]Huh, what's this...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, my apologies, everyone!
It's almost time for practice!

group_1.textRight: Oh, I'm sorry!

group_1.textLeft: I suppose our meeting is adjourned for the day.
